items.prota.desc.message: You are the protagonist of Revenge.

items.hab_alberto.desc.message: The room where you lay innumerable times with your now deceased wife. Suddenly you feel very guilty for having defiled your sanctum with that display of obscene postures, and what postures, and how obscene, that you have developed with Matilda during the last months.

items.salón_alberto.desc.message: The living room suffers from the lack of a female hand. From being a pleasant place to sit and have a pleasant time, it has become an extension of your room, with clothes stacked in chairs and unfriendly

items.salón_matilda.desc.message: The floor is Matilda is as it was the last time you visited. Everything in its place, except ... a diary on the living room table.

items.hab_matilda.desc.message: You know this room well. The few times you have visited her, you have come directly here to taste the docks of the bed.

items.cocina.desc.message: A very well stocked kitchen. As she works today, Matilde seems to have prepared something quick to eat today and has allowed a food taperware to thaw.

items.foto_boda.desc.message: In the framed photo Clara and you are in the foreground. Behind you you see some guests smiling, except Matilda, who seems to cast a look of hatred on Clara. Strange, you had not noticed that look before, they were supposed to be very good friends.

items.foto_quemada.desc.message: You notice that the burned part corresponds to the part where Matilda was before.

items.llaves_matilda.desc.message: The keys themselves have nothing special, a security key from Matilda's floor door, on the fourth floor; and the key to the portal.

items.tupperware.desc.message: Half thawed, a serving of meat pie.

items.barra_labios.desc.message: Apparently it's just a lipstick. You take great care to remove the lid.

items.frasco.desc.message: Looks like a little cologne dispenser.

messages.mesa_noche_desc.txt.message: Night stand. When Matilda comes, you usually keep in your drawer the photo of your wedding because you are ashamed to have her in sight with her, as getting rid of the photo, which represents a lot for you.

messages.mesa_noche_con_foto.txt.message: On the table is the picture of your wedding.

messages.foto_arde.txt.message: When you pick up the photo, a shiver runs through you. You stare as the photo begins to burn through one of its corners. At that moment, the door of the room opens wide alone and creates a draft of air that extinguishes the small flame of the photo, and throws it to the adjoining room.

messages.tiras_cristales.txt.message: With neatness and safety you collect the crystals with care and the strips in the trash.

messages.foto_boda__vuela_contra_pared.t.message: When you go to take the photo, you marvel at how it goes flying and crashes against a wall, breaking the frame and leaving a trail of broken glass and the loose photo. You are looking for a logical explanation and you are self-convincing that you have been responsible yourself: an involuntary muscle spasm or something. Things always have a logical explanation.

messages.ex_diario_0.txt.message:
You read with horror the last entry in your diary:
& quot; But what the hell! With what has cost me Alberto eating from my hand after being comforting him months after widowing. And what it took me to get "widowed", risking me to end up in jail. With all this, with the fulfillment of the first year since Clara finally passed with my help to the other world, he now returns to think about her even if he tries to hide it. But nothing, that day will pass and it will be all mine again and forever. & Quot;
Your legs tremble, you do not believe what you are reading. Notes vibrate your wedding ring, and note the presence of Clara, even without seeing it.

messages.ex_diario_1.txt.message:
You keep reading, you go to the date of the day of your death:
& quot; What a silly look you put when we were in the bathroom of the restaurant and I told you that I had just poisoned her and had four heartbeats left. The stupid woman collapsed and stared at me as I screamed, cried, and asked disconsolately for help. I will keep forever that contaminated lipstick that lent him as a reward for my audacity. Soon I will air Luis. Alberto will finally be mine, and I will be the friend to whom he will cry and to whom he will catch, and much, I hope! "

messages.ex_diario_2.txt.message: You no longer have the courage to keep reading. What you had to know, you know.

messages.pomo_eléctrico.txt.message: But what…? The doorknob gives you a gag and you can not open it. What a ridiculous thing this is. "I hope Matilda is not playing me a joke on the other side."

messages.salir_sin_llaves.txt.message: And where do you suppose you want to go?

messages.salir_con_llaves.txt.message: You pick up the key and go up to the fourth floor. Today is Saturday morning and she is working. It's a good idea to prepare a romantic lunch for you to find the table prepared when you get home.

messages.atrás_no.txt.message: Back, or to get some momentum.

messages.fin_juego_1.txt.message:
You're not 100 percent sure this will work. What if it was just a sexual stimulant?
After applying it, you close the tupper and hide behind the curtain in the living room. She has to be about to arrive, but time seems to have stopped and it seems centuries, until you hear how the door opens and she enters.

messages.eres_descubierto.txt.message: Matilda sees the keys and is surprised. He makes a detailed round the house and discovers you. When the curtain runs you can not think of anything but to say "surprise!" & Quot; She is glad to see you, and she relaxes to see that the diary is in place. It invites you to eat but you excuse saying that your stomach hurts, but you accompany it while you have lunch in the living room.

messages.fin_juego_2.txt.message: Now everything goes very fast. She gets comfortable, very sexy, and sits down to eat in the living room. Suddenly she stops and seems to look at you, but, no, it is not you but the figure of Clara that appears between you two and says: "do not put on that stupid face, you only have four heartbeats" ; Clara turns to you, looks at you with affection and disappears in a circle of light that appears next to you

messages.fin_juego_3.txt.message: The prison bed is not very uncomfortable. Your lawyer says that claiming transient mental alienation due to reading the newspaper, in a few months you will be back home. Your lawyer is very attractive and gives you all your support, sometimes more than strictly professional. You'll probably stay for dinner when you get out of jail, but it might not be a good idea to tell her about Clara's post-mortem jealousy.

messages.intro_cumple.txt.message: Today marks the anniversary of the death of Clara, your wife. You should have a sad life as a disconsolate widower, but since you started dating Matilda a few months ago, you changed your handkerchiefs to cry for condoms, well, to be used rather than stored in a drawer. a rare day. You've slept awful, remembering past birthdays in which you always made an unexpected gift to Clare to satisfy her and show her your love. Somehow, you have the need to make a gift, but it's stupid. She has no niche where to leave it since it was cremated and its dehydrated debris was thrown into the ocean.

messages.llaves_aparecen.txt.message: This is a surprise! Next to the photo that has come flying to the living room, falling on the messy sofa, you see something shine. You discover hidden the keys of Matilda's apartment, which he lost a few months ago and never appeared. This says a lot about how little you clean. You left the key to your apartment shortly after the first revolts, but there was no reciprocity in that. She is very jealous of her privacy.

messages.frasco_aparece.txt.message: You diligently search for the weapon of crime and soon find it in a box in which appears along with a bottle that says: For Alberto, in case it was ever necessary

messages.diario_quieto_parao.txt.message: Better not move it so that Matilda does not know that you have read it.
